segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and she looks so happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely absorbed in what she's doing, like she's in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous behind her back, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what she's thinking about, to be so happy and distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing her so content, even if she's unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, creating a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices the water soon before it ruins the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll slip and fall, but she seems so steady and happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so careless, but she's just humming away, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile seeing her so happy and content.
segments.speaker: PAR
